column1: This file is used to define the job ids called from wlc_guest_user_creator.py script cli (the first 6 rows are ignored by the script). Sample job below:

For timezone related information and correct code to use check "http://www.timezoneconverter.com/cgi-bin/tzc?style=2" and make sure the code exists within the available timezone codes in this file "/var/scripts/wlc_guest_user_creator/timezone_list.txt"
